Name: Soulbaby: Remastered
About the game: An original rogue-lite experience combining bullet-hell and traditional, turn-based RPG elements. As a newfound hero, endure countless waves of enemies as you shape your identity, increasing performance attributes and learning new skills, on a journey to uncover the mystery of a fading cosmos. Early Access Features World map with countless waves of randomized enemies and bosses. Learn over 12 unique skills. Explore 4 transmutations for passive perks. Find party members to help you destroy baddies Level up stats to your preferred play style.
